Sentencas: In this paper, the surface properties of the (001) surface LaBO3 (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) perovskites and oxygen adsorption mechanism are investigated using first-principles calculations based on density functional theory (DFT) and pseudopotential method.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: Surface rumpling and Mulliken effective atomic charges have been obtained.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: The surface rumpling displays a big wave and increases following the sequence Fe < Co < Mn < Ni at the BO2-terminated surface.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: The calculated effective charges show that the excess electronic charges at the LaO-terminated surface transfer to the inner atom of the surface.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: We also report a comparative study of oxygen molecular adsorption properties at BO2- and LaO-terminated surfaces of LaBO3 (001).
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: The optimized geometries of the adsorbed oxygen species, adsorption energies, bond lengths, bond populations, and effective charges have been analyzed.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: The results show the oxygen molecule adsorption at the hollow site of the LaO-terminated surface has much higher adsorption energy and dissociation probability than that at other sites.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: Oxygen species has a strong tendency for getting adsorbed at the site and thereby filling it.
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms

Sentencas: The comparative study of the LaBO3 (001) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanism may guide us to search for high-efficiency cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: The comparative theoretical study of the LaBO3 (001) (B = Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) surface properties and oxygen adsorption mechanisms
